settings.question: How do I buy your products?
settings.answer: RKI products are available for purchase in over twenty-five hundred fine decorative, plumbing and home furnishing showrooms nationwide. Our product is also available through major online retailers.Check the dealer locator section for a dealer near you, or the internet for online retailers that sell the item you are looking for. We do not sell direct to individual consumers.

settings.question: What are your products made of?
settings.answer: Our products are cast with durable, high quality metals including solid brass and zinc.

settings.question: Are there variations in finishes or “lot-to-lot variances”?
settings.answer: Yes. Due the nature of the finishing process, you will see some lot-to-lot variation. More elaborate finishes will have deeper variations within a specific lot as well, such as color, accents, and / or explicit finish differences.

settings.question: Are these “living” finishes?
settings.answer: Our Venetian Bronze finish will subtly change with time, touch, and exposure to different climates. Our other finishes are not considered “living” or unlacquered.

settings.question: How do I care for your products?
settings.answer: We got you. All Hapny hardware includes (2) different mounting screws to accommodate almost all cabinet door and drawer sizes.Our knobs and pulls include a #8-32, 1” Phillps head screw and a break-away #8-32, 1.75” Phillips head screw with four break points (¾", 1", 1 ¼" and 1 ½"). Our knobs come with (1) of each screw per product and our pulls come with (2) of each screw per product. Our appliance pulls include (2) 1/4”-20, 1.25” Phillips head screws and (2) 1/4”-20, 1.75” Phillips head screws.  For custom or additional screw needs, you should be able to find what you need at your local hardware store.

settings.question: What screws come with the cabinet knobs and pulls?
settings.answer: Gentle is key. Clean your hardware with a soft, damp cloth, and wipe completely dry. Do not leave any water or soap residue on your product. Never use any chemicals or harsh over-the-counter cleansers. These will strip your hardware of its finish and, even worse, void your warranty.

settings.question: How do I get extra screws or mounting hardware?
settings.answer: We’re thrilled you asked! In order to become a registered dealer of Hapny Home products, you must have a showroom to display our product to the public. We typically require a minimum purchase of four half-size display boards to open a wholesale account with us.To start the process, please visit our Become a Dealer page to share more information, or send an email with your company and request details orders@hapnyhome.com.

settings.question: What is the warranty for your products?
What doesn't the warranty cover?
Products are missing from my shipment. What do I do?
settings.answer: Claims for shortages must be made within (7) business days of receiving the order. We will ship out the missing hardware immediately.

settings.question: Products in my shipment are defective. How do I get a replacement?
settings.answer: Claims for defective items must be made within (7) business days of receiving the order. We will ship out replacements immediately.

settings.question: How do I return products? Are there restock fees?
settings.answer: We allow returns up to (90) days from the original date of purchase.  All returns are subject to a 30% restock fee, assuming they are returned in good and “resalable” condition. Damaged returns will face higher restock fees, and unusable product will be rejected.

settings.question: What shipping service do you use to ship your orders?
settings.answer: All of our orders are shipped via UPS Ground.

settings.question: Do you offer expedited shipping?
settings.answer: Yes! Expedited shipping options, such as UPS Red ("Next Day Air"), UPS Blue ("Two Day") or UPS Orange ("Third Day") are all available for an additional cost.

settings.question: I have my own UPS account. Can you use that to ship my order?
settings.answer: Yes! Many vendors have us ship their orders via their verified UPS account number. Third-party billing is often a way to get a deeper discount on UPS freight charges.

settings.question: How is freight calculated?
settings.answer: Our freight costs are calculated directly by UPS, taking into account factors like package weight, destination, insurance, etc. Expedited shipping adds an additional charge onto the total freight amount.  We charge freight on all orders, including items that are shipping as a result of an original backorder.  We do not add on any service or handling fees.

settings.question: Do you charge any drop ship fees?
Is there a warranty for your products?
settings.answer:
Yes, we got you. At Hapny Home, we are committed to creating high quality products for your home. We offer all our consumers a Limited Lifetime Warranty to show that we stand behind the quality, durability, and design of our goods.

Hapny Home products are covered from all manufacturer defects and breakage. Our warranty applies to the original purchaser and is non-transferrable. The warranty lasts for the lifetime of the original purchaser for as long as they own the Hapny Home product. Selling or transferring the product invalidates the warranty.

settings.question: What isn't covered under your warranty?
settings.answer:
Our warranty does NOT cover:
-Normal wear and tear of product over time. This is not considered a defect.
-Product damage due to improper installation or failure to follow mounting instructions
-Misuse of the product
-Any damages or expenses caused by defective product
-Finish and metal deterioration caused by things out of our control, such as exposure to atmospheric conditions, corrosive air, outdoor environments, natural disasters, or accidents

settings.question: Do you replace damaged hardware?
settings.answer: Under the warranty, we commit to repair or replace the defective product or provide a refund on a case-by-case basis. Please email us at support@hapnyhome.com with a photo showing the damaged or defective product(s) and documentation of you being the original purchaser, and we'll be in touch with next steps.
